issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Load Data for managed tables should set the owner of loaded files to a configurable user

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The check for managed table should use ENUM comparison rather than string comparison.

The check in the patch will always return false, thus maintaining existing behavior.
fields.summary: Followup to HIVE-19928 : Fix the check for managed table
